title: Hawaii Corner Sofa
description: The recently designed Hawaii Corner and 3+2 Sofa Set in Grey does come with the simplest of attractions that make it representative of modern-day elegance along with the comfort that is so essential in the furniture products of today. This article corner sofa set arrived from Sliding Wardrobes 4U, which is made with the best fabric material and is suitable for both luxury and long-lasting use in the living room. That light grey hue contributes to that nice and rather neutral look that can fit into almost any interior design decision, modern or classic.

title: Lisbon Sliding Wardrobe
description:
The LISBON Sliding Door Wardrobe epitomizes luxurious living and is the ultimate package with a price tag affordable for most! The length mirror on this wardrobe not only adds light to your bedroom but creates the illusion of enlarged bedroom space. The elegant horizontal paneled door further adds to this wardrobe’s beauty and also creates a calm, tranquil aura – perfect when you want your bedroom as a place where you can escape the hassle and bustle of the day! The Lisbon Sliding Wardrobe is equivalent to 4 single wardrobes. It boasts 8 huge cubed storage shelves, plus another 2 suitcase-size shelves on top. So there’s more than enough room for all your clothes, as well as bedding, boots, and storage boxes.

This wardrobe also benefits from the high-quality sliding mechanism and you would barely hear any noise with the smooth gliding motion of the doors. It is crafted from 16 mm laminated particle board to give you beauty, stability, and durability all in one! Add extra hanging rails and you can configure this wardrobe in different ways (refer to images).

Features:
Full-length mirror
Hush quiet sliding doors
Multiple hanging, shelf, and drawer storage options
Quality 16mm laminated board
Extra suitcase-size storage shelves on top

reviews.comment: I really this wardrobe. Quick delivery and fine fitting.
